title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Zurich, Switzerland
description:
This year Xmas comes early to all genuine coders: we are looking forward to seeing you in Zurich at the best day of the year, #GDCR16!
 
 Our hosts, as per tradition, are the friendliest and coolest IT shop in town: Namics AG (http://www.namics.com/namics/standorte/zuerich/).
 
 We are open for registrations, the capacity is limited, we are usually full, reserve your seat now at Coders Only | Zurich (http://zurich.codersonly.org/events/code-retreat/).
 
 Also, check out the GDCR events in Bern and St. Gallen as well, you may need to travel less!
